predefined.SUBHEADER: This way module will not load a default language from server once more.
predefined.HEADER: You can predefine a default language while still using a lazzy loading.
predefined.TITLE: How to use lazzy loading without autoupload?

dynamic.SUBHEADER: It will use the "lang" request param passed into GET.
dynamic.HEADER: The module can lazzy load a translations table from the dynamic page.
dynamic.TITLE: How to load dynamic files?

static.SUBHEADER: So, you can load only those languages, which will be used.
static.TITLE: How to load static files?
static.TEXT: This is only some text to fill the space.
static.HEADER: The module can lazzy load a translations table when it's needed.
